### TBUCKET
Creates groups of values - buckets - out of a @timestamp attribute. The size of the buckets must be provided directly.

```esql
FROM sample_data
| STATS min = MIN(@timestamp), max = MAX(@timestamp) BY bucket = TBUCKET(1 hour)
| SORT min
```
